scripts.build:wasm-mt: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-parallel -- --manifest-path ./Cargo.toml -Z build-std=panic_abort,std
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:wasm-mt && webpack build
